title: T.I's wife Tameka 'Tiny' Harris has over $750,000 in jewels stolen from her Lamborghini in Atlanta
text:
Tameka 'Tiny' Harris had a small fortune in jewelry stolen from her vehicle in Atlanta on Sunday night.

The 44-year-old singer and reality star had approximately $750,000 worth of jewelry stolen from her Lamborghini, according to People.

The jewelry was stolen while Harris - the wife of rapper T.I. - had drinks with a friend at an Atlanta bar on Sunday night.

Robbery: Tameka 'Tiny' Harris had a small fortune in jewelry stolen from her vehicle in Atlanta on Sunday night

Atlanta police responded to a call of a car robbery outside Bar Amalfi at approximately 11:23 PM on Sunday night.

Tiny explained to officers that she parked her Lamborghini SUV outside of the bar at approximately 8:45 PM and entered the Italian bar restaurant to have drinks with a friend.

She then returned to her car roughly an hour later, when she noticed a blue velour bag containing her jewelry was missing. The bag was previously sitting on her center console, according to Tiny.

Robbery: Atlanta police responded to a call of a car robbery outside Bar Amalfi at approximately 11:23 PM on Sunday night

The Atlanta Journal-Constitution reports that among the items stolen was her wedding ring, along with 'watches and stud earrings.'

The theft was not reported until 11:23 PM, with Atlanta police investigator James White stating that, 'There were no signs of forced entry or damage observed to the vehicle.

Tiny's friend returned to the vehicle once during their outing, but stated that she did not know about the jewelry.

Wedding: The Atlanta Journal-Constitution reports that among the items stolen was her wedding ring, along with 'watches and stud earrings'

Harris was at the bar for a party on Sunday night, and her Lamborghini SUV was one of several luxury vehicles parked outside.

Security officials posted outside of the restaurant did not report seeing any suspicious that night.

Harris, who has been married to the Whatever You Like rapper since 2010, is just the latest in a string of car robberies in the Atlanta area recently.

Back in March, nearly $500,000 in jewelry was stolen from rapper Young Dolph's vehicle outside of a Cracker Barrell in Fairburn.

Last month, a friend of Love and Hip Hop star Alexis Skyy had her Maserati stolen from an Atlanta gas station while they were putting air in the tires.
